heading: HR01171
0: RESOLUTION TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE ALLEGATIONS OF ILL-GOTTEN WEALTH LODGED AGAINST COMMISSION ON ELECTIONS (COMELEC) CHAIR JOSE ANDRES D. BAUTISTA WORTH NEARLY PHP 1 BILLION, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO PAYOFFS HE ALLEGEDLY RECEIVED FROM THE DIVINA LAW OFFICES, COUNSEL FOR ELECTION TECHNOLOGY PROVIDER SMARTMATIC, WHICH HAS BEEN SUPPLYING AUTOMATED ELECTION MACHINES TO THE COMELEC SINCE THE MAY 2010 NATIONAL ELECTIONS, AND DIVULGED TO THE PUBLIC BY HIS VERY OWN ESTRANGED WIFE PATRICIA PAZ "TISH" BAUTISTA
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2017-08-14
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01171
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE ALLEGATIONS OF ILL-GOTTEN WEALTH LODGED AGAINST COMMISSION ON ELECTIONS (COMELEC) CHAIR JOSE ANDRES D. BAUTISTA WORTH NEARLY PHP 1 BILLION, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO PAYOFFS HE ALLEGEDLY RECEIVED FROM THE DIVINA LAW OFFICES, COUNSEL FOR ELECTION TECHNOLOGY PROVIDER SMARTMATIC, WHICH HAS BEEN SUPPLYING AUTOMATED ELECTION MACHINES TO THE COMELEC SINCE THE MAY 2010 NATIONAL ELECTIONS, AND DIVULGED TO THE PUBLIC BY HIS VERY OWN ESTRANGED WIFE PATRICIA PAZ "TISH" BAUTISTA
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROQUE, HARRY L.
DATE FILED : 2017-08-07
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON RULES ON 2017-08-14
